Text: Wow...
(Pr-Princess Alexia?! What's she doing here?!)

(Well, she's the second princess of Midgar Kingdom.
It's only natural for her to be at a casino that's
reserved mainly for royalty.)

(More importantly, why is she also wearing a bunny
costume? It makes no sense for a princess to be
dressed in one. She must be up to something...

(Judging by the dumb look on her face, I'd say it's
her first time in a casino.)

Hey! I'm a customer! You can't treat me like this!
Lemme go, or else—
Agh?! Aahh...

The safety of our guests is our priority, so we have
rendered him unconscious. We sincerely apologize
for any discomfort this has caused you.

We hope you continue to enjoy your time at our
tables.

(I see. Being the high-class casino that it is, the
staff seem highly competent.)

(Thanks to what just happened, I've managed to figure
out how extensive the security is here.)

(The problem is the princess being here. Since I'm
currently undercover, the presence of someone who
knows my identity is highly risky.)

(It'll be a real problem if she notices me here and
refers to me as "Natsume." I'll need to handle this
as soon as possible.)

(Besides, I assume she's also up to something based
on the fact she's in a bunny costume. I'll stay two
steps ahead and make my move first...!)

I see. Of course, it's only natural some win big
while others lose big.

It serves them right, but I shudder to think of such
a financial fallout...
That's the kind of world this is, Princess.

Huh?! Who're you calling "Princess"?! ...Wait, you're
Natsu—

Just as Alexia is about to say her name, Beta puts
her hand over her mouth.
*muffle, muffle* (Wh-What the heck?!)
Stop. Please, calm down.
Pfft! Wh-What was that for?!

I just need you to promise you won't mention my name
here. Understood?

What's up with all this? Hmph. Anyway, keeping quiet
doesn't benefit me. I won't agree to some annoying
promise.

Oh? Judging by your surprise just now, I'm guessing
you're keeping your identity as a "princess" hidden.
Ulp...

Something tells me I'm not the only one wanting to
keep their name a secret.

Ack. Tit for tat, huh? Fine, I'll keep quiet for your
sake.

Why do you always have to act so entitled? Anyway...
what're you even doing here?

I was invited to this casino today. I'm an official
guest of honor.

Is that so? I see. That's quite an unusual outfit
for an official guest of honor.

Well, um...aristocrat after aristocrat was coming up
to greet me, so I ditched them to avoid the hassle.

That's literally the point of being a guest of
honor...

A-Anyway, my father and sister said I was forbidden
from visiting casinos, so it only made me even more
curious to see what they're all about...

Are you telling me that's why you're disguised as one
of the staff? You do know the staff can't play at the
tables, right?

O-Of course I do! But I only realized that after I
put on the costume, so get off my case!

Besides, you're also wearing a bunny costume.
Explain yourself.
No, don't tell me. I've already figured it out.
Huh?

Allow me to explain. You hit your limits as a writer,
so you switched careers to being a bunny girl!
Elementary, my dear, Natsume.

W-R-O-N-G! My writing career is going just fine,
thank you very much!
Well, that's a shame... That costume suits you.
Is that meant to be a compliment or an insult?

Anyway, I doubt you're willing to say much more.
Fine, then I'm guessing you're conducting some sort
of undercover interview.
Um, something like that—
Hey, new girl! What're you slacking off for?
Oh, my apologies! I'll get back to work immediately!

Well then, if you'll excuse me. Please keep to your
promise, understood?
Honestly. What in the world is she up to?
